tech_news.title: Latest macOS 26.3 beta adds to signs that new M5 MacBook Pros are imminent - 9to5Mac
tech_news.description: Today’s macOS 26.3 RC adds to the expectation that updated MacBook Pro versions with new M5 chips are coming sooner rather than later.

tech_news.title: System76's COSMIC Desktop Planning Vulkan Renderer, Improved Gaming Experience - Phoronix
tech_news.description: Following December's release of COSMIC Epoch 1 along with the Pop!_OS 24.04 release by System76, today they shared more of their feature plans for the next two major COSMIC desktop updates.

tech_news.title: Valve’s Steam Machine has been delayed, and the RAM crisis will impact pricing - The Verge
tech_news.description: Valve is delaying the launch of the Steam Machine, Steam Frame, and Steam Controller, and it says that it has to revisit pricing because of the memory and storage crunch.

tech_news.title: Alphabet won’t talk about the Google-Apple AI deal, even to investors - TechCrunch
tech_news.description: Alphabet CEO skipped an analyst's question about Apple on the company's earnings call.

tech_news.title: Russian-state hackers exploit Office vulnerability to infect computers - Ars Technica
tech_news.description: The window to patch vulnerabilities is shrinking rapidly.

tech_news.title: Meet Gizmo: a TikTok for interactive, vibe-coded mini apps - TechCrunch
tech_news.description: Gizmo's app is like a TikTok for vibe-coded mini apps... and it's a lot of fun.

tech_news.title: Overwatch’s Heroes Are Getting Hotter, Here’s Why - Kotaku
tech_news.description: Blizzard says that it’s hoping for more character diversity moving forward

tech_news.title: Nintendo’s new Virtual Boy is more fun to look at than to play - The Verge
tech_news.description: The new Virtual Boy headset looks like a gorgeous blast from Nintendo’s past, but the games definitely show their age.

tech_news.title: "This has been heartbreaking" - laid-off Ashes Of Creation devs won't get final paychecks and compensation, says former comms head - Rock Paper Shotgun
tech_news.description: Ashes Of Creation devs laid off during the reported closure of Intrepid Studios will not receive the compensation they're due, according to a former comms head.

tech_news.title: At 82, he’s as fit as a 20-year-old. His body holds clues to healthy aging. - washingtonpost.com
tech_news.description: Scientists are studying Juan López García, 82, a world-record-holding ultramarathoner, to learn how we can stay healthy as we age.
